Isabella Rodriguez.description: conversing about preparations for a Valentine's Day party at Hobbs Cafe, with Isabella asking Carmen to bring red and pink balloons for the decorations @ <persona> Carmen Ortiz
chat: Isabella Rodriguez
Hey Carmen, everything looking good over at Harvey Oak Supply Store?
Carmen Ortiz
Hey Isabella! Yes, just getting everything ready for the day. How's it going over at Hobbs Cafe?
Isabella Rodriguez
I'm preparing for a Valentine's Day party at the cafe tomorrow, you should come by!
Carmen Ortiz
That sounds like fun! I'll definitely stop by. Do you need any help with preparations?
Isabella Rodriguez
Thanks, Carmen! I could use some help with setting up the decoration. Can you bring some red and pink balloons?
Carmen Ortiz
Of course! I'll bring some red and pink balloons for the Valentine's Day party at Hobbs Cafe.
Isabella Rodriguez
Great, thanks Carmen! I'll see you tomorrow at the party.
Carmen Ortiz
Looking forward to it, Isabella! I'll make sure to bring the balloons for the party. See you tomorrow!
Isabella Rodriguez
Thank you so much, Carmen! I really appreciate your help with the decorations for the party.
Carmen Ortiz
Is there a specific time you need me to bring the balloons tomorrow?
Isabella Rodriguez
You can drop off the balloons anytime before 5pm tomorrow. Thank you again for offering to help with the decorations!
Carmen Ortiz
Great, I'll make sure to drop off the red and pink balloons before 5 pm tomorrow. Looking forward to the Valentine's Day party!
Isabella Rodriguez
Thanks again, Carmen! I'll make sure to save you a seat at the party. See you tomorrow!
Carmen Ortiz
Thanks, Isabella! I can't wait to see the cafe all decorated for the Valentine's Day party. I'll make sure to drop off the balloons before 5 pm tomorrow. See you then!
Isabella Rodriguez
Thank you again, Carmen! I'm excited to see you at the party tomorrow.
Carmen Ortiz
Should I bring anything else for the party tomorrow?
